topic.title: EnhancedHtml
topic.shortdesc: Show and manage multiple pages of localized html content

section.title: Introduction
section.p: This module is able to show multiple pages of localized content inside a single module. The pages are normal Text/Html pages that can be edited with the graphical editors which comes bundled with your Rainbow installation.

The module provides access to the multiple pages using horizontal list of index links, and using a standard next - previous command bar. The navigation indexes are build dynamically, and the edit options screen provides you with control over their layout.

You are able to select if you want hide or show any of the navigation items, if they should be shown over, under, at the left, or at the right side of the page content. The module has a site wide option where the user can select to see all the content from all pages within the module as a single page. The selection is stored in a cookie, so the preference is preserved between visits.
